text: [This creature seems odd, but I'll listen.] (looks at Alice inquisitively)
[Cats! How terrifying!] (gives a sudden leap out of the water) (quivers all over with fright)
[How insensitive!] Not like cats! Would you like cats, if you were me?
[This girl is impossibly dense!] (bristles all over) We wo'n't talk about her any more, if you'd rather not.
[Now dogs! This is unbearable!] (swims away as hard as it could go)
[Now it's my turn to dry things up with my tale.] 'William the Conqueror, whose cause was favoured by the pope, was soon submitted to by the English...'
[She's not even listening!] (angrily) I had not!
[That's it! I've had enough of this nonsense.] I shall do nothing of the sort. You insult me by talking such nonsense!
